snippet.title: Platform Adventure | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A short platforming adventure with no monsters - just puzzles, platforming and loot! 

Made with love, and Unreal Engine 5. 

► Get the official pre-release version here: https://auroral-games.itch.io/
► Check out the development live on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/auroralgames

This is a small solo dev project that I've been making live on stream. It's my first game that has been in depth enough to warrant a full trailer, so I learned video editing for an evening and here it is in all it's platforming glory! 

I'm so proud of this whole project and I can't wait for people to play and (hopefully) enjoy it as much as I enjoy making it! This project is my first platformer game and the trailer is my first ever video so be kind! :D 

Happy Platforming!
